      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlinnPhongRenderer
      This Renderer can draw meshes and splines by using the Blinn-Phong shading.
      class  ScreenRenderer
      Renders the rendering pipeline's final frame to a fullscreen quad.
      class  ShadowRenderer
      Performs shadow map rendering.
      class  SolidColorRenderer
      It can render Renderables by drawing them with one color.
